PackageOracle.name: DA_VIEWING_SESSION
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_VIEWING_SESSION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.24.785719000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,receiving_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,recv_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,viewing_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,viewing_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,content_id IN NUMBER
,content_access_device_id IN NUMBER
,viewing_session_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,viewing_content_accs_device_id IN NUMBER
,bcst_channel_id IN NUMBER
,station_call_sign_id IN NUMBER
,real_tm_view_ind IN NUMBER
,tune_val IN VARCHAR2
,close_caption_ind IN NUMBER
,mutd_ind IN NUMBER
,fast_forward_ind IN NUMBER
,rvrs_ind IN NUMBER
,dvc_insrtd_content_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,receiving_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,recv_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,viewing_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,viewing_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,content_id IN NUMBER
,content_access_device_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_viewing_session;

body.name: DA_VIEWING_SESSION
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_VIEWING_SESSION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.24.797033000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,receiving_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,recv_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,viewing_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,viewing_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,content_id IN NUMBER
,content_access_device_id IN NUMBER
,viewing_session_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,viewing_content_accs_device_id IN NUMBER
,bcst_channel_id IN NUMBER
,station_call_sign_id IN NUMBER
,real_tm_view_ind IN NUMBER
,tune_val IN VARCHAR2
,close_caption_ind IN NUMBER
,mutd_ind IN NUMBER
,fast_forward_ind IN NUMBER
,rvrs_ind IN NUMBER
,dvc_insrtd_content_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_viewing_session.add, parms=' || receiving_access_method_id || '|' || recv_session_start_dttm || '|' || viewing_access_method_id || '|' || viewing_session_start_dttm || '|' || content_id || '|' || content_access_device_id || '|' || viewing_session_end_dttm || '|' || viewing_content_accs_device_id || '|' || bcst_channel_id || '|' || station_call_sign_id || '|' || real_tm_view_ind || '|' || tune_val || '|' || close_caption_ind || '|' || mutd_ind || '|' || fast_forward_ind || '|' || rvrs_ind || '|' || dvc_insrtd_content_ind || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_viewing_session a
(
a.receiving_access_method_id
,a.recv_session_start_dttm
,a.viewing_access_method_id
,a.viewing_session_start_dttm
,a.content_id
,a.content_access_device_id
,a.viewing_session_end_dttm
,a.viewing_content_accs_device_id
,a.bcst_channel_id
,a.station_call_sign_id
,a.real_tm_view_ind
,a.tune_val
,a.close_caption_ind
,a.mutd_ind
,a.fast_forward_ind
,a.rvrs_ind
,a.dvc_insrtd_content_ind
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.receiving_access_method_id
,add.recv_session_start_dttm
,add.viewing_access_method_id
,add.viewing_session_start_dttm
,add.content_id
,add.content_access_device_id
,add.viewing_session_end_dttm
,add.viewing_content_accs_device_id
,add.bcst_channel_id
,add.station_call_sign_id
,add.real_tm_view_ind
,add.tune_val
,add.close_caption_ind
,add.mutd_ind
,add.fast_forward_ind
,add.rvrs_ind
,add.dvc_insrtd_content_ind
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_viewing_session.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,receiving_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,recv_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,viewing_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,viewing_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,content_id IN NUMBER
,content_access_device_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_viewing_session.del, parms=' || receiving_access_method_id || '|' || recv_session_start_dttm || '|' || viewing_access_method_id || '|' || viewing_session_start_dttm || '|' || content_id || '|' || content_access_device_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_viewing_session a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.receiving_access_method_id = del.receiving_access_method_id
AND a.recv_session_start_dttm = del.recv_session_start_dttm
AND a.viewing_access_method_id = del.viewing_access_method_id
AND a.viewing_session_start_dttm = del.viewing_session_start_dttm
AND a.content_id = del.content_id
AND a.content_access_device_id = del.content_access_device_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_viewing_session.del');

END del;

END da_viewing_session;
